name: (Nu) Da Drum
description:
Intended for not-fullscreen 1920 x 1080 for full effect.

---

Controls:

Click and Hold - Drag the Teddy

R - Respawn Teddy

M - mute the game

U - unmute the game

F - fullscreen

I - not-fullscreen

ESC - close game

---

This game is an embarassingly honest attempt at figuring out why I can’t let go of things. Some narrative elements might be inspired by my own experiences, others may not.

Visit the Ludum Dare Site for more information:

 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/nu-da-drum
